name: Dragoon's road
text: This card is always treated as a
spell. Once per turn; during your main phase you can special summon one
monster from your hand, deck, or grave yard, or you can discard one card and special summon a
fusion monster from you extra deck, if you special summon a
fusion monster this way it is treated as if it was fusion summoned. Each
monster's you control cannot be destroyed by battle or card effects once per turn.
